title: Market share of tablet brands in the United Kingdom ( UK ) 2013
summary: The statistic depicts the Market share of brands Tablet Brand in the European Union ( United Kingdom ) in 2013 .
Other was the leading brands Tablet Brand in the United Kingdom in 2013 , with a Market share of 24 % , followed by Acer with 2 % .
These two Brand amount to approximately a third of the brands Tablet Market in the United Kingdom .
gold: This statistic shows the respective market shares of the leading tablet brands in the United Kingdom ( UK ) . In 2013 , 56 percent of UK tablet owners used an Apple iPad . Thus , the iPad brand is the most popular for tablets .
